nodes.text: The Needle Ne-4 was a model of cloud car manufactured by Bespin Motors during the Galactic Civil War. It was a speedy patrol ship used by high-altitude stations and cities and smugglers due to its powerful engines. The craft also saw use in an illegal racing circuit, taking place in cloud structures in gas giants.
The Needle is first mentioned in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game sourcebook Dangerous Covenants.
